name: INTERV_NOTE_INFO
description: This table links a care plan goal note contact to the related intervention note contacts that were filed at the same time.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the goal note contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INTERV_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for one of the child intervention notes that was documented at the same time as this goal note. A goal note links to the contact serial numbers of all of the child intervention notes that were filed at the same time as the goal note so that this related documentation can be shown together.
